column1: Oh all right boys. Come on in.
Here he is, boys. Our dear little Kenny.
Your friends are here to see you, Kenny.  They miss you an awful lot, like we all do.
Hurry up, Kenny! You're gonna be late for school!
Hurry up, Kenny! You're gonna be late for school!
You see boys, Kenny is in here.  What the???  Wait a minute! This is kitty litter!
Oh my God! This is awful!  And disgusting!
